channel.title: [PI]Price glitch (I think)
channel.description: Hi guys, I using Project Insanity and I added shop into my server. It going all right but when I want to buy item it says it costs 0 points, bet when I selling it it says you can sell it for 30k. Here's pic. [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/5853/errorqc.png[/img] Thanks.

item.title: [PI]Price glitch (I think)
item.dc:creator: @zirual zirual
item.description:
@zirual wrote:

I have no idea what you talking about. I only find this thing in shoassistant.java

public void buyFromShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot){ int ShopValue = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 0, removeSlot)); ShopValue *= 1.15; String ShopAdd = ""; if (c.myShopId >= 17) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " points."); return; }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Price glitch (I think)
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Go into shopassistant.java and then search any shop that uses points… you will then most likely see your shop there and just delete the shop id OR the npc id… You might of mistaking taken a shop id from another shop and its already in codes… so just go check it out.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Price glitch (I think)
item.dc:creator: @zirual zirual
item.description:
@zirual wrote:

I just need help here…

infexisgoat:

Buying and selling in a shop are 2 separate things.

So I asking how to do what I can buy item from shop for coins.
